short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to quickly search AppFoundry, Developer Forums, Jira, Product Ideas Lab, and Resource Center

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables users to search the various sites Genesys Customer Care uses on a daily basis from any browser window or tab.
